title: OpenAI Staff Granted Permission to Liquidate Shares at Astounding $86 Billion Valuation â€“ Insider Report
description: In a pivotal development for the artificial intelligence sector, OpenAI, a leading startup in the field, has recently authorized its employees to trade their shares in the company. This decision follows a lucrative tender offer that pegs OpenAI’s valuation at a staggering $86 billion, positioning it as one of the most prized tech ventures globally, […]
